item.title: Setting up mbed-cli on Linux
item.description: Intro This tutorial comes from the fact that I faced errors that were simple but not easy to find the solution due to the mbed compile scripts error outputs. I will try to get involved with the project to help improve feedback from the scripts thus reducing the need to go out seeking help. Steps 1. Download the latest toolchain. It can be untar and installed where its more convinient: https://developer.
